segments.text: I was wondering if you need any help on your new project .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ! That would be great ! Are you good at writing or would you rather do the computer work ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to help with the computer work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! We are going to be working in teams of three . Are you OK working with others ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I like working like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will begin next Monday . Would you be available then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if you could send me your basic background information before next Monday , it would be useful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will send the information to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well then , thanks for your help . Have a great day !
segments.speaker: S2
